EnumParameter.Name: path_select
EnumParameter.Description: Index to classify parameters for speech and audio. Class 1 parameter. Default value: 0

ValuePair.Literal: Speech Parameters for UL speech path WNR
Audio Left Parameters for WNR Audio Left channel
Audio Right Parameters for WNR Audio Right channel

EnumParameter.Name: audio_mode
EnumParameter.Description: Choice to process different combination of stereo. Class 1 parameter. Note: This parameter is used only when WNR_PathSelect is 1D. Ignored in case of PathSelect = 0D 0r 2D. Default value: 0

ValuePair.Literal: Process left channel and leave right channel untouched
Process right channel and leave left channel untouched
Process stereo signal with left parameters applied on left channel and right parameters applied on right channels
Process left channel and copy the same output on left and right channels

FixedPointParameter.Name: min
FixedPointParameter.Description: Lower threshold for energy ratio computation. Class 2 parameter. Default value: 410

FixedPointParameter.Name: max
FixedPointParameter.Description: Upper threshold for energy ratio computation. Class 2 parameter. Default value: 20480

IntegerParameter.Name: low
IntegerParameter.Description: Low cut-off frequency used in the energy ratio test. Class 2 parameter. Default value: 16

IntegerParameter.Name: mid
IntegerParameter.Description: Mid cut-off frequency used in energy ratio test. Class 2 parameter. Default value: 32

IntegerParameter.Name: high
IntegerParameter.Description: Upper cut-off frequency used in the energy ratio test. Class 2 parameter. Default value: 128

IntegerParameter.Name: low
IntegerParameter.Description: Lower cut-off frequency for centroid computation. Set to microphone cut-off frequency. Class 1 parameter. Default value: 2

IntegerParameter.Name: high
IntegerParameter.Description: Upper cut-off frequency for centroid computation. Class 2 parameter. Default value: 32

FixedPointParameter.Name: min
FixedPointParameter.Description: Lower threshold for centroid comparison. Threshold Power of loudspeaker. Class 1 parameter. Default value: 4915

FixedPointParameter.Name: max
FixedPointParameter.Description: Upper threshold for centroid comparison. Class 1 parameter. Default value: 11469

FixedPointParameter.Name: dec
FixedPointParameter.Description: Smoothing factor for decreasing values. Class 2 parameter. Default value: 1638

FixedPointParameter.Name: inc
FixedPointParameter.Description: Smoothing factor for increasing values. Class 2 parameter. Default value: 6554

IntegerParameter.Name: peak_min
IntegerParameter.Description: Lowest frequency used in the minima search for weighting the noise estimate. Should correspond to the microphoneâ€™s cut-off frequency. Class 1 parameter. Default value: 0

FixedPointParameter.Name: peak_threshold
FixedPointParameter.Description: Threshold power difference for local minima search. Class 2 parameter. Default value: 102

FixedPointParameter.Name: alpha_poly_max
FixedPointParameter.Description: Maximum value of alpha for polynomial fitting. This value adjusts the allowable steepness of the noise estimate. Class 1 parameter. Default value: -8192

FixedPointParameter.Name: max
FixedPointParameter.Description: Maximum smoothing factor for the noise estimation. Upper value in the range of the adaptive smoothing factor used in the noise estimation. Class 2 parameter. Default value: 29491

FixedPointParameter.Name: min
FixedPointParameter.Description: Minimum smoothing factor for the noise estimation. Lower value in the range of the adaptive smoothing factor used in the noise estimation. Class 2 parameter. Default value: 3277

IntegerParameter.Name: low
IntegerParameter.Description: Lower frequency threshold for noise estimate during speech activity. Used to limit noise estimate above this frequency during speech activity. Class 2 parameter. Default value: 15

IntegerParameter.Name: high
IntegerParameter.Description: Upper frequency threshold for noise estimate during speech activity. Noise estimate set to 0 above this frequency during speech activity. Class 2 parameter. Default value: 31

IntegerParameter.Name: low
IntegerParameter.Description: Lower frequency threshold for noise estimate during non-speech activity. Used to limit noise estimate above this during non-speech activity. Class 2 parameter. Default value: 63

IntegerParameter.Name: high
IntegerParameter.Description: Upper frequency threshold for noise estimate during non-speech activity. Noise estimate set to 0 above this frequency during non-speech activity. Class 2 parameter. Default value: 79

FixedPointParameter.Name: gain_min
FixedPointParameter.Description: Minimum gain value. Class 2 parameter. Default value: 0

IntegerParameter.Name: hpf_bins
IntegerParameter.Description: Cut-off frequency of fixed high-pass filter. Class 2 parameter. Default value: 2

FixedPointParameter.Name: g_min_hpf_bins
FixedPointParameter.Description: Gain minimum below high pass filter cut-off. Class 2 parameter. Default value: 3277

FixedPointParameter.Name: gamma_nf
FixedPointParameter.Description: Weighting of the noise floor for comparison to current signal power. Class 2 parameter. Default value: 8192

FixedPointParameter.Name: zeta_nf
FixedPointParameter.Description: Noise floor overestimation factor. Class 2 parameter. Default value: 12288

EnumParameter.Name: noise_floor_usage
EnumParameter.Description: Flag used to turn ON and OFF the use of the noise floor. Class 1 parameter. Default value: 1

IntegerParameter.Name: nr_init_count
IntegerParameter.Description: Initial minimum statistics skip parameter. Class 2 parameter. Default value: 30

IntegerParameter.Name: min_stat_len
IntegerParameter.Description: Minimum statistics search window length. Class 1 parameter. Default value: 20
